document.query: INSERT INTO `provider_setting` (`name`, `value`, `type`, `provider_id`, `created_at`, `updated_at`) VALUES ('minSwapUSDT', '20', 'BTCUSDT', (SELECT id FROM provider WHERE username='binance'), NOW(), NOW()), ('minSwapBTC', '0.0005', 'BTCUSDT', (SELECT id FROM provider WHERE username='binance'), NOW(), NOW());
